name: Mykhailo Kulyk
meta_title: PHP Developer | Skilled in Legacy Code, Modern Frameworks, CMS Integration | Full-Stack Skills: PHP, MySQL, JavaScript, HTML, SCSS/CSS
title: Full Stack & Backend PHP Developer
summary: I am an experienced developer with a strong focus on delivering results and maintaining high standards throughout the project lifecycle. I consistently follow defined priorities and tasks, and I strive to write clean, maintainable code while effectively understanding and working with code written by others.
purpose: I am looking for a long-term position in a stable, technically mature team where I can leverage my expertise, broaden my technology stack, solve complex technical challenges, and deliver long-term value to my future employer.

skills.Backend: PHP 7/8 (OOP, SOLID, MVC, Design Patterns), Yii2, Laravel, Symfony;
skills.Server & Deployment: Linux, (CentOS, Debian, Ubuntu), NGINX, bash, deployment processes;
skills.Additional: Basic, technical SEO, Google Ads management.

experience.description: Worked on various client web projects, covering full-cycle development using modern PHP Frameworks (Laravel 8, Symfony 5/6) and CMS platforms (PrestaShop 8, Joomla 4). Responsible for both backend and frontend tasks, from planning to delivery.

responsibilities.Project Development: Developed and maintained custom web applications using PHP, MySQL, JavaScript, and jQuery.
responsibilities.Custom Extensions: Built modules, plugins, and custom components for E-Commerce platform PrestaShop and content management system Joomla
responsibilities.Client Collaboration: Collaborated directly with clients to understand requirements and provide technical solutions
responsibilities.Deployment and Optimization: Supported deployment, performance optimization, and debugging.
responsibilities.Google Ads: Managed and optimized Google Ads campaigns for clients.

experience.position: Head of Technology | B2B E-commerce Platform Development | Startup
experience.description: Led the technical development and implementation of a B2B e-commerce platform. Translated business requirements into scalable software solutions and managed a development team using agile practices.

responsibilities.Tech Leadership: Designed architecture and led development using Yii2, Symfony, and MySQL.
responsibilities.Team Management: Recruited and mentored developers, fostering a collaborative environment.
responsibilities.Agile Management: Managed sprints and milestones using Scrum and Kanban.
responsibilities.Server & Deployment: Maintained Bitbucket repositories, performed code reviews, and administered CentOS servers.
responsibilities.Database Optimization: Ensured high performance and scalability of MySQL structures.

experience.position: Full-Stack Web Developer | Founder of a Web Studio
experience.description: Founded and ran a web studio delivering end-to-end development for corporate websites and e-commerce projects, with a strong focus on CMS platforms.

responsibilities.Full-Cycle Development: Planned, developed, and maintained scalable web solutions.
responsibilities.Custom Coding: Created responsive templates, modules, and plugins.
responsibilities.Client Engagement: Built long-term client relationships and translated business needs.
responsibilities.Support & SEO: Provided technical support and managed Google Ads campaigns.
responsibilities.Team Collaboration: Worked with designers, SEO experts, and content teams.

experience.description: Provided freelance services for small businesses, focusing on frontend development and CMS integration.

responsibilities.Template Development: Created responsive HTML, CSS, and jQuery templates.
responsibilities.CMS Integration: Integrated and customized WordPress and Joomla themes.
responsibilities.Compatibility: Ensured cross-browser support and frontend performance.

education.institution: East European University of Economics and Management
education.description: Four-year bachelor's program in Digital Economics combines IT and business disciplines. The curriculum includes programming, web development, database design, and data analytics, alongside business process management, project planning, and digital transformation strategy.
